titleStmt.title: Something by way of rejoynder to Richard Smith his reply wherein I have cleared my self and others from the lyes and slanders which he (as his usual manner is) hath cast upon us. Written by Alexander Lawrence.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, Alexander, d. 1682.

notesStmt.note: In response to Smith, Richard. A brief reply to Alexander Lawrence's pamphlet.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
